title: Get Smooth Sandstone in Minecraft: Furnace, Crafting, & More

steps.title: Get sandstone, any fuel source, and a furnace.
steps.content: Get sandstone, any fuel source, and a furnace. You’ll need these 3 things to make smooth sandstone. 1 sandstone will output 1 smooth sandstone using this method. [1] X Research source If you’re just starting out, read these articles on installing Minecraft and playing Minecraft . Even if you’ve already beat Minecraft , smooth sandstone could be a great block for enhancing your creative builds.

steps.title: Go to your furnace.
steps.content: Go to your furnace. This is the gray utility block that looks like an oven made of stone. [2] X Research source If you don’t have a furnace nearby, you can quickly make one using 9 of any stone-tier block and a Crafting Table. Place the 9 stone blocks (such as cobblestone) in a 3-by-3 square in the Crafting Table menu. There should be an empty square in the middle of the menu. Click the furnace on the right to put it in your inventory. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Right-click the furnace.
steps.content: Right-click the furnace. This will open the furnace menu.

steps.title: Place the sandstone in the top box.
steps.content: Place the sandstone in the top box. This is located above the flame icon.

steps.title: Place the fuel source in the bottom box.
steps.content: Place the fuel source in the bottom box. This is below the flame.

steps.title: Wait for the furnace to make the smooth sandstone.
steps.content: Wait for the furnace to make the smooth sandstone. The furnace will take a short amount of time to smelt the sandstone into smooth sandstone.

steps.title: Click the smooth sandstone.
steps.content: Click the smooth sandstone. When the smooth sandstone is ready, it will appear in the box to the right of the arrow. Clicking it will add it to your inventory. You’re ready to start using it in your builds!

steps.title: Get 4 sandstone blocks and a Crafting Table.
steps.content: Get 4 sandstone blocks and a Crafting Table. This method only works on older versions of Minecraft. 4 sandstone blocks will yield 1 smooth sandstone.

steps.title: Right-click the Crafting Table.
steps.content: Right-click the Crafting Table. This will open the Crafting Table menu.

steps.title: Place the 4 sandstone blocks in a 2-by-2 square.
steps.content: Place the 4 sandstone blocks in a 2-by-2 square. A smooth sandstone block will appear to the right of the arrow. Repeat with more sandstone to make more smooth sandstone.

steps.title: Find a desert village.
steps.content: Find a desert village. These can be found in the desert biome. To find a desert biome, look for a large area with light brown blocks and cactuses in your World. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Mine smooth sandstone from the village.
steps.content: Mine smooth sandstone from the village. The desert village structures are partially made of smooth sandstone. To find smooth sandstone, look for brownish yellow blocks with a smooth texture. Don’t worry, the villagers won’t mind you taking their blocks. However, take care not to hit the villagers with your pick!

steps.title: Open the item selection screen.
steps.content: Open the item selection screen. This screen replaces your normal inventory when you’re playing in Creative Mode . [5] X Research source

steps.title: Click the search icon.
steps.content: Click the search icon. This is a magnifying glass icon in the tab row at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Type “smooth sandstone” in the search box.
steps.content: Type “smooth sandstone” in the search box. This will show you item results related to that query.

steps.title: Click the smooth sandstone block.
steps.content: Click the smooth sandstone block. This will add smooth sandstone to your inventory. You’re ready to start using smooth sandstone in your creative endeavors!
